title: (x) 'HAT' unusual serif face w/ bowed crossbar on 'A' - Ehrhardt {Yves}
content:
Hello,

I have been witnessing the ID magic going on here for a while now, really amazing!!

I really love the bow on the crossbar of the A...  
and the weight of the serifs  
but really cannot put my finger on it  
any ideas or alternatives would be greatly appreciated!
